titles.title: A resolution to recognize Claude Denson Pepper, on the occasion of his 88th birthday, for the contributions that he has made to the quality of life of all Americans.

action.text: Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/8/1988--Introduced. Declares that the House of Representatives commends Claude Denson Pepper, on the occasion of his 88th birthday, for his contributions to the quality of life of all Americans.
